sqlMap.select:
from App WHERE 1=1
describe like '%' || #describe# || '%'
expression like '%' || #expression# || '%'
id like '%' || #id# || '%'
identify like '%' || #identify# || '%'
name like '%' || #name# || '%'
path like '%' || #path# || '%'
region.id = #region.id#
state.id = #state.id#
order by id desc

select count(*) from App WHERE 1 = 1
describe like '%' || #describe# || '%'
expression like '%' || #expression# || '%'
id like '%' || #id# || '%'
identify like '%' || #identify# || '%'
name like '%' || #name# || '%'
path like '%' || #path# || '%'
region.id = #region.id#
state.id = #state.id#
from App a left join fetch a.state left join fetch a.region where a.state.type = 'STATE' and a.state.val='STATE_ENABLE'

select distinct t1.id,t1.describe,t1.identify,t1.modifytime,t1.name,t1.state_id,t1.expression,t1.path,t1.region_id,t1.need_password as needPassword from u_app t1, staff t2 where 1 = 1 and t1.id = t2.resource_id and t2.user_id = #staff_id# and t1.name <> '4A安全管理系统' and t1.state_id = '107'
order by t1.id desc
